cn.description:
Snap Camera Pro 是一款功能强大的专业相机应用，为用户提供丰富的拍摄和图片编辑功能。支持iOS平台，致力于为用户带来专业级的摄影体验。
核心功能
专业拍摄功能
• 多种拍摄模式 ：支持普通拍摄、定时拍摄等多种模式
• 闪光灯控制 ：智能闪光灯开关，适应不同光线环境
• 网格线辅助 ：提供构图辅助线，帮助用户拍出更专业的照片
• 前后摄像头切换 ：灵活切换前置和后置摄像头
图片编辑功能
• 丰富滤镜效果 ：包含原图、复古、黑白、暖色调等多种专业滤镜
• 图像参数调节 ：支持亮度、对比度、饱和度精细调节
• 实时预览 ：编辑过程中实时查看效果
• 高质量输出 ：保持图片原有质量进行处理
 用户体验
• 直观界面设计 ：简洁易用的用户界面，符合iOS设计规范
• 主题切换 ：支持多种主题模式，个性化定制
• 照片管理 ：内置相册功能，方便管理和浏览拍摄的照片
• 分享功能 ：一键分享到社交平台或保存到相册
技术特性
• 权限管理 ：合规的相机和存储权限申请
• 性能优化 ：流畅的拍摄和编辑体验
• 兼容性 ：支持多种iOS设备和系统版本
• 稳定性 ：完善的错误处理和异常管理
应用价值
Snap Camera Pro 为iOS用户提供了一个集拍摄、编辑、管理于一体的完整摄影解决方案。无论是摄影爱好者还是普通用户，都能通过这款应用轻松创作出高质量的照片作品。
应用严格遵循Apple的开发规范和隐私政策，确保用户数据安全，提供可靠的使用体验。所有功能均为本地处理，保护用户隐私的同时提供快速响应。

cn.description:
《无处遁形：全网公敌》是Steam平台广受好评的剧情向黑客解密游戏《全网公敌》手游版本。玩家通过网络搜索和社工手段获取目标人物信息，其隐藏最深的秘密都无处遁形。游戏中的每个故事看似各自独立，但随着剧情的发展却是草蛇灰线，伏脉千里。当所有事件串联起来，竟隐藏着惊天的秘密……

希望玩家在游玩的同时，对网络本身也能产生反思，学会保护好个人隐私。

【游戏内容】
◆第一章：程序员之死
某公司CEO跳楼自杀，自称被毒妻勒索千万；而妻子却在社交网络上发布被家暴的照片。谣言满天，谁在说谎？
◆第二章：看不见的眼睛
女大学生的不雅视频在网络疯传，这一刻，她已然社会性死亡。到底谁才是始作俑者？女性的安全又该由谁去保护？
◆第三章：消失的证据
品学兼优的学生会长忽然失踪。霸凌事件使案情越发扑朔迷离。谁是凶手，谁是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代价
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！恐吓信、炒作、前女团成员自杀事件……网络再掀舆论狂欢！
◆第五章：永生代码
当社会陷入癫狂，你是否也愿意加入永生代码，获得真正的爱与永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一个看似甜蜜而美满的家庭背后，每个人都有各自的秘密，隐藏在背后的真相到底是什么？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一场离奇的车祸，让泰坦公司的高级研究员Lucrezia Borgia博士当场死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死里逃生，但他却没有意识到自己即将卷入一场巨大的阴谋之中……

【游戏特点】
◆代入感强：在虚构的世界里，玩家扮演一名黑客，接受一家公司委托，完成一个个不同的社工事件，体验真实的黑客操作。
◆玩法多样：游戏内有多个系统，除了社工系统，还会有推理、追踪、解谜，破坏侵入等系统需要玩家们去一一攻破。
◆剧情复杂：游戏中你将面临大量的选择和谜题，而不同的选择可能将导致不同的结局。
◆人物众多：登场人物众多，每个人物都有自己的性格特点，而他们背后都有着不为人知的故事，需要作为黑客的你去一一发现事件的真相。
◆全程配音：游戏中所有出现的角色都有真人配音，让整个游戏的体验和代入感更加强烈。
◆原创音乐：多首原创主题曲以及各种音乐音效，搭配精彩剧情，享受震撼体验。

【核心功能】
◆网络搜索：玩家通过浏览器搜索功能收集目标对象的基础信息。
◆数据库：利用已知信息输入到数据库中，通过筛选后或许目标对象的其他信息。
◆破解：通过获得的目标人物信息来生成密码，用于登陆各平台的账户（包括邮箱、社交平台、聊天软件等）。
◆伪装：获取目标对象的需求、社交圈等，根据信息选择伪装，通过和目标对象接触获取更多信息。
◆聊天沟通：添加目标对象为好友后，进行聊天沟通获取信息。
◆图片分析：从图片中获取有价值的信息内容及相关线索。
当然，后期还会解锁更多的高阶社工方法！

cn.description:
Luwian 是一款复杂的相机应用程序，旨在提供对相机硬件的完全手动控制，从而使用户能够使用 DSLR 设计释放他们的创造力。此外，该应用程序还附带 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 后处理编辑器，可提高图像质量。

Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

hk.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。

hk.description:
生還僅是惡夢的開端。

前所未見的生物災害「拉昆市事件」已過去六年。
成為特務的里昂·S·甘迺迪接獲命令，前往營救被綁架的總統千金。
為此里昂踏進被「瘋狂」支配之地，他的結局會是……
一場生與死、恐懼與釋懷互相交織的嚴酷營救劇即將揭開帷幕。

透過直觀的操作和最新的畫面，以及再構成的故事重生為全新的生存恐怖體驗。

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

hk.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲

mo.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。

在《Resident Evil》主系列的第8部作品中展開一場令人毛骨悚然的絕命拚搏。

伊森一家的平靜生活又再一次被捲進了混亂之中，而打破這種平靜日常的不是別人，正是克里斯·雷德菲爾。伊森又再一次陷入那無法醒來的噩夢。

經過多年開發，日趨成熟的RE Engine為大家打造了全新的生存「動作」恐怖體驗。
------------------------------------------------------------
App內購買
《Resident Evil Village》（遊戲本體）購買此產品可以讓您玩完整的遊戲本體。
　「痛苦追憶包」
　·武器「武士之刃：AW Model-01」
　·「尋獲片段」畫面濾鏡
　·RE7 卡式錄音機儲存點
　·安全室的特別背景音樂《Go Tell Aunt Rhody》
　·武器飾品「妙妙先生」
　·立即開放「Village of Shadows」難度
　·藝術圖特典
　·貝克一家調查報告
　求生物資包
　武器飾品「浣熊先生」

溫特斯擴充包
追加內容「溫特斯擴充包」收錄三大內容：包括能以第三人稱視角遊玩《Resident Evil Village》遊戲本篇的「第三人稱視角模式」、新加入可操控角色及新關卡的「傭兵模式——追加命令」，以及以伊森的愛女「蘿絲」為主角的新故事《蘿絲之影》！

Street Wolf 裝束
蘿絲服裝「Street Wolf Outfit」
※只適用於《蘿絲之影》

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

mo.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

Developed for and published on iOS by Feral Interactive Ltd. iOS and the iOS logo are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S. and other countries. Feral and the Feral logo are trademarks of Feral Interactive Ltd. All other trademarks are the properties of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲

國際標準化組織
快門速度

tw.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。

在《Resident Evil》主系列的第8部作品中展開一場令人毛骨悚然的絕命拚搏。

伊森一家的平靜生活又再一次被捲進了混亂之中，而打破這種平靜日常的不是別人，正是克里斯·雷德菲爾。伊森又再一次陷入那無法醒來的噩夢。

經過多年開發，日趨成熟的RE Engine為大家打造了全新的生存「動作」恐怖體驗。
------------------------------------------------------------
App內購買
《Resident Evil Village》（遊戲本體）購買此產品可以讓您玩完整的遊戲本體。
　「痛苦追憶包」
　·武器「武士之刃：AW Model-01」
　·「尋獲片段」畫面濾鏡
　·RE7 卡式錄音機儲存點
　·安全室的特別背景音樂《Go Tell Aunt Rhody》
　·武器飾品「妙妙先生」
　·立即開放「Village of Shadows」難度
　·藝術圖特典
　·貝克一家調查報告
　求生物資包
　武器飾品「浣熊先生」

溫特斯擴充包
追加內容「溫特斯擴充包」收錄三大內容：包括能以第三人稱視角遊玩《Resident Evil Village》遊戲本篇的「第三人稱視角模式」、新加入可操控角色及新關卡的「傭兵模式——追加命令」，以及以伊森的愛女「蘿絲」為主角的新故事《蘿絲之影》！

Street Wolf 裝束
蘿絲服裝「Street Wolf Outfit」
※只適用於《蘿絲之影》

tw.description:
生還僅是惡夢的開端。

前所未見的生物災害「拉昆市事件」已過去六年。
成為特務的里昂·S·甘迺迪接獲命令，前往營救被綁架的總統千金。
為此里昂踏進被「瘋狂」支配之地，他的結局會是……
一場生與死、恐懼與釋懷互相交織的嚴酷營救劇即將揭開帷幕。

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tw.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

tw.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

tw.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特點：

曝光控制
對焦+對焦鎖定控制
飛漲

us.description:
Final Fantasy III -- now on iPhone!

When darkness falls and the land is robbed of light, four youths are chosen by the crystals to embark upon a journey to save the world.

FINAL FANTASY III was the first title in the FINAL FANTASY series to become a million-seller, establishing once and for all that Square Enix's classic RPG saga was here to stay.

A hallmark of innovation for the entire series, FINAL FANTASY III incorporates not only a job system that lets characters change classes at any time to the ability to summon powerful creatures such as Shiva and Bahamut.

The 3D remake of FINAL FANTASY III, with fully-rendered 3D graphics, duplicated the original's success.

- The four protagonists have been completely redesigned and new scenarios have been added.

- The 3D remake has really brought the cutscenes and battles to life.

- The Job system has been improved to bring out its best and most unique aspects, resulting in a more balanced game that is easy to enjoy.

- New save functions, including autosave, allow for players to quit the game at any time without fear of losing their progress.

--------------------------------------------

Aditionally, the smartphone version has been improved to include the following:

- High resolution graphics and retouched cutscenes.

- Smooth, intuitive touch-panel controls specifically tailored to improve the gaming experience.

- Gallery Mode, where players can view  illustrations from the game  or listen to the soundtrack, has been added.

- New visual designs for the Job Mastery Cards and the Mognet .

us.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

us.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

us.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later

us.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

us.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

tr.description:
Final Fantasy III -- now on iPhone!

When darkness falls and the land is robbed of light, four youths are chosen by the crystals to embark upon a journey to save the world.

FINAL FANTASY III was the first title in the FINAL FANTASY series to become a million-seller, establishing once and for all that Square Enix's classic RPG saga was here to stay.

A hallmark of innovation for the entire series, FINAL FANTASY III incorporates not only a job system that lets characters change classes at any time to the ability to summon powerful creatures such as Shiva and Bahamut.

The 3D remake of FINAL FANTASY III, with fully-rendered 3D graphics, duplicated the original's success.

- The four protagonists have been completely redesigned and new scenarios have been added.

- The 3D remake has really brought the cutscenes and battles to life.

- The Job system has been improved to bring out its best and most unique aspects, resulting in a more balanced game that is easy to enjoy.

- New save functions, including autosave, allow for players to quit the game at any time without fear of losing their progress.

--------------------------------------------

Aditionally, the smartphone version has been improved to include the following:

- High resolution graphics and retouched cutscenes.

- Smooth, intuitive touch-panel controls specifically tailored to improve the gaming experience.

- Gallery Mode, where players can view  illustrations from the game  or listen to the soundtrack, has been added.

- New visual designs for the Job Mastery Cards and the Mognet .

tr.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

Truths don't stay in the dark...
In this detective puzzle set among the streets, historical buildings, and dark secrets of Istanbul, each chapter awaits you to solve a new case.

Evidence Chain is a gripping detective game that progresses chapter by chapter, where you interrogate suspects and piece together evidence to solve the mystery. At the heart of the game is a card-based interrogation system:

Cross-examine witnesses,
Gather information by scouring archives,
Find traces with specialized tools,
Expose suspects' inconsistent statements!
Each chapter takes place in a different district of Istanbul: From the narrow streets of Galata to an old secondhand bookstore in Kadıköy, new clues await you in a variety of mysterious locations.

tr.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tr.description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING: Please expand this description and read the full list of supported devices below to confirm that your device is supported.

TWO LEVELS FREE
Play the first two levels of Lara’s Aztec adventure for free, then unlock levels 3-14 and all DLC via a single in-app purchase.

===

Battle, platform and puzzle your way through the Mexican jungle in an action-packed tomb-raiding adventure. Explore temples, traverse toxic swamps and navigate volcanic caverns to defeat Xolotl, the Keeper of Darkness, before he plunges the world into eternal night.

DUAL PISTOLS AND TWIN STICKS
Carve a path through undead hordes in fast-paced combat, and bolster your arsenal with unlockable weapons and superpowered relics.

BRAIN TEASING AND CHASM LEAPING
Leap, grapple and swing your way past cunning puzzles and trap-laden challenges.

SOLO ACTION OR CO-OP CAPERS
Save the world solo or bring a friend for seamless multiplayer, via local network or online.

PICK UP AND PLAY — AGAIN AND AGAIN!
Beat high scores, tackle side objectives and discover hidden collectables on every level.

TOUCHSCREEN OR GAMEPAD CONTROLS
Customise the touchscreen controls to taste, or connect your favourite gamepad.

===

We recommend playing Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light on iOS 17 or later. You need 4GB of free space on your device, though we recommend at least double this to avoid initial installation issues.

Supported iPhones:  

 • iPhone XR and later
 • iPhone SE 2nd Generation (2020) and later

Supported iPads:  

 • iPad mini 5th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Air 3rd Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad 7th Generation (2019) and later
 • iPad Pro 2nd Generation (2017) and later

• If you require assistance, please contact our support team at support@feralinteractive.com

tr.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.
